original_text: And they offered great sacrifices that day and rejoiced, for God had made them rejoice with great joy; the women and children also rejoiced. And the joy of Jerusalem was heard far away.
korean_text: 이 날에 무리가 큰 제사를 드리고 심히 즐거워하였으니 이는 하나님이 크게 즐거워하게 하셨음이라 부녀와 어린 아이도 즐거워하였으므로 예루살렘이 즐거워하는 소리가 멀리 들렸느니라

sentences.original_text: And they offered great sacrifices that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 날 큰 제물을 드렸고

sentences.original_text: for God had made them rejoice
the women and children also rejoiced
